p:
The Barcode Wales and Barcode UK projects provide 98% coverage for the native flowering plants and conifers of the UK
37 . This reference library was supplemented with a curated library of the non-native and horticultural species, downloaded from GenBank. This UK species list was generated using the list of native species of the UK from Stace (2010)
39 , 505 naturalised alien species (BSBI), and horticultural species from the IRIS BG database at the National Botanic Garden of Wales.
